verses.verse: For <WG1063> yourselves <WG846>, brethren <WG80>, know <WG1492> our <WG2257> entrance in <WG1529> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209>, that <WG3754> it was <WG1096> not <WG3756> in vain <WG2756>:

But <WG235> even <WG2532> after that we had suffered before <WG4310>, and <WG2532> were shamefully entreated <WG5195>, as <WG2531> ye know <WG1492>, at <WG1722> Philippi <WG5375>, we were bold <WG3955> in <WG1722> our <WG2257> God <WG2316> to speak <WG2980> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316> with <WG1722> much <WG4183> contention <WG73>.
For <WG1063> our <WG2257> exhortation <WG3874> was not <WG3756> of <WG1537> deceit <WG4106>, nor <WG3761> of <WG1537> uncleanness <WG167>, nor <WG3777> in <WG1722> guile <WG1388>:

But <WG235> as <WG2531> we were allowed <WG1381> of <WG5259> God <WG2316> to be put in trust <WG4100> with the gospel <WG2098>, even so <WG3779> we speak <WG2980>; not <WG3756> as <WG5613> pleasing <WG700> men <WG444>, but <WG235> God <WG2316>, which trieth <WG1381> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588>.

For <WG1063> neither <WG3777> at any time <WG4218> used we <WG1096> flattering <WG2850> words <WG1722> <WG3056>, as <WG2531> ye know <WG1492>, nor <WG3777> a cloke <WG1722> <WG4392> of covetousness <WG4124>; God <WG2316> is witness <WG3144>:

Nor <WG3777> of <WG1537> men <WG444> sought <WG2212> we glory <WG1391>, neither <WG3777> of <WG575> you <WG5216>, nor <WG3777> yet of <WG575> others <WG243>, when we might <WG1410> have been <WG1511> burdensome <WG1722> <WG922>, as <WG5613> the apostles <WG652> of Christ <WG5547>. been: or, used authority
But <WG235> we were <WG1096> gentle <WG2261> among <WG1722> <WG3319> you <WG5216>, even as <WG5613> a nurse <WG5162> cherisheth <WG302> <WG2282> her <WG1438> children <WG5043>:

So <WG3779> being affectionately desirous <WG2442> of you <WG5216>, we were willing <WG2106> to have imparted <WG3330> unto you <WG5213>, not <WG3756> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316> only <WG3440>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> our own <WG1438> souls <WG5590>, because <WG1360> ye were <WG1096> dear <WG27> unto us <WG2254>.

For <WG1063> ye remember <WG3421>, brethren <WG80>, our <WG2257> labour <WG2873> and <WG2532> travail <WG3449>: for <WG1063> labouring <WG2038> night <WG3571> and <WG2532> day <WG2250>, because <WG4314> we would <WG1912> not <WG3361> be chargeable <WG1912> unto any <WG5100> of you <WG5216>, we preached <WG2784> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209> the gospel <WG2098> of God <WG2316>.

Ye <WG5210> are witnesses <WG3144>, and <WG2532> God <WG2316> also, how <WG5613> holily <WG3743> and <WG2532> justly <WG1346> and <WG2532> unblameably <WG274> we behaved ourselves <WG1096> among you <WG5213> that believe <WG4100>:

As <WG2509> ye know <WG1492> how <WG5613> we exhorted <WG3870> and <WG2532> comforted <WG3888> and charged <WG3140> every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of you <WG5209> <WG5216>, as <WG5613> a father <WG3962> doth his <WG1438> children <WG5043>,
<WG2532> That <WG1519> ye <WG5209> would walk <WG4043> worthy <WG516> of God <WG2316>, who hath called <WG2564> you <WG5209> unto <WG1519> his <WG1438> kingdom <WG932> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391>.

For this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> also <WG2532> thank <WG2168> we <WG2249> God <WG2316> without ceasing <WG89>, because <WG3754>, when ye received <WG3880> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> which ye heard <WG189> of <WG3844> us <WG2257>, ye received <WG1209> it not <WG3756> as the word <WG3056> of men <WG444>, but <WG235> as <WG2531> it is <WG2076> in truth <WG230>, the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>, which <WG3739> effectually worketh <WG1754> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> that believe <WG4100>.

For <WG1063> ye <WG5210>, brethren <WG80>, became <WG1096> followers <WG3402> of the churches <WG1577> of God <WG2316> which <WG3588> in <WG1722> Judaea <WG2449> are <WG5607> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>: for <WG3754> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> have suffered <WG3958> like things <WG5024> of <WG5259> your own <WG2398> countrymen <WG4853>, even <WG2532> as <WG2531> they have <WG846> of <WG5259> the Jews <WG2453>:

Who both <WG2532> killed <WG615> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> their own <WG2398> prophets <WG4396>, and <WG2532> have persecuted <WG1559> us <WG2248>; and <WG2532> they please <WG700> not <WG3361> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> are contrary <WG1727> to all <WG3956> men <WG444>: persecuted us: or, chased us out

Forbidding <WG2967> us <WG2248> to speak <WG2980> to the Gentiles <WG1484> that <WG2443> they might be saved <WG4982>, to <WG1519> fill up <WG378> their <WG846> sins <WG266> alway <WG3842>: for <WG1161> the wrath <WG3709> is come <WG5348> upon <WG1909> them <WG846> to <WG1519> the uttermost <WG5056>.

But <WG1161> we <WG2249>, brethren <WG80>, being taken <WG642> from <WG575> you <WG5216> for <WG4314> a short <WG5610> time <WG2540> in presence <WG4383>, not <WG3756> in heart <WG2588>, endeavoured <WG4704> the more abundantly <WG4056> to see <WG1492> your <WG5216> face <WG4383> with <WG1722> great <WG4183> desire <WG1939>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> is our <WG2257> hope <WG1680>, or <WG2228> joy <WG5479>, or <WG2228> crown <WG4735> of rejoicing <WG2746>? <WG2228> Are not <WG3780> even <WG2532> ye <WG5210> in the presence <WG1715> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> at <WG1722> his <WG846> coming <WG3952>? rejoicing: or, glorying
